alert.note: Alert for Itasca; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 9:51PM CDT until August 28 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Itasca County in north central Minnesota... West central St. Louis County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coleraine, or near Grand Rapids, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Taconite around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pengilly, Keewatin and Nashwauk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
